message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations and contribute to substantial growth. Given its immense value to you, I propose a price of $1250000 for the product. This figure strikes a balance between ensuring a fair return on investment for us while offering you an attractive deal considering the product's worth to you at $1500000. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to collaborate with you.
